scripts.dev: echo "Open index.html directly in your browser"
scripts.build: echo "Static site - no build step required"
scripts.start: echo "Static site - use any HTTP server to serve index.html"
scripts.validate:html: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const html = fs.readFileSync('index.html', 'utf8'); if (!html.includes('<!DOCTYPE html>')) { throw new Error('Invalid HTML'); } console.log('HTML is valid');"
scripts.precommit: npm run validate:js && npm run validate:html && npm run lint:check

*.html: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const html = fs.readFileSync(process.argv[1], 'utf8'); if (!html.includes('<!DOCTYPE html>')) { throw new Error('Invalid HTML'); }"
